Reporternike air max 90 venta online learned yesterday, they filed a suit in the court notice of its complement other materials on May 4.Experience | in Beijing from kindergarten to junior high school, when the move was "stuck"Chen Hui (a pseudonym) in Beijing workers 20 years, residence in Xinyang, Henan, 14-year-old son from nursery school to start is in Beijing, between 2011-2014, in the middle school high school student in Beijing, with Beijing official school and will graduate this year junior high school. But when you sit in high school, high school enrollment system does not apply to children or wife to provide the appropriate procedures, registration website shows "candidates after children or wife raised their studies online application and the qualification can apply for the category school." In other words, his children can apply for vocational schools, and can not apply for an ordinary high school.Reporter Query Beijing Education Examination "issued in 2014 in Beijing, China Merchants work notice" found that non-city residence of the candidates, to distinguish between the different enrollment under different circumstances,

"Taiwanese children", "post-doctoral children", "army children ", etc., may apply for an ordinary high school without Beijing official residence, qualified candidates Children of Migrant Workers may apply for secondary vocational schools, but does not have to apply for an ordinary high school qualifications."I think it is unfair to our children, this distinction is clear discrimination." After consulting a lawyer, Chen Hui and the other seven parents jointly developed an administrative complaint. Complaint that the defendant acts illegal, a violation of the plaintiff's equal right to education, the requirements apply high school in Beijing.Feedback | Interim Policy apply only children or wife vocational28 pm, Chen Hui with the screen name "Forgotten Rangers Beijing migrant workers," the matter sent to microblogging, as of 14:00 yesterday, forwarded more than 1600.Congress suspected of criminal how to do Yesterday, "the Standing Committee of Guangzhou Municipal People's Congressnike air max 90 baratas on behalf of the license to take certain measures restricting personal freedom and implementation of the provisions of the Criminal Justice (draft)" submitted to the twenty-eighth session of the fourteenth session of the Standing Committee for consideration, Congress expressly provided for representative to take the measures to be licensed, and by the Standing Committee of the permission for the arrest or on behalf of a criminal trial, nor restrictions on behalf of liberty.
